getting_started.quick_start:
To get started, simply describe what you need: 
• 'I need to write a follow-up email to a client'
• 'Help me plan a product launch communication strategy'
• 'Generate a board presentation summary email'
• 'Create a customer onboarding email sequence'
getting_started.guided_approach:
For complex needs, I'll guide you through:
1. Requirements gathering and clarification
2. Strategy development and validation
3. Content generation and optimization
4. Review and refinement
pro_tips: Be specific about your audience and objectives
Mention any regulatory or compliance requirements
Specify preferred tone and brand voice
Share any existing templates or examples you'd like to build upon
